feed.title: PlikShare Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.7
entry.content:
Changes:

  • [FEATURE] New user default configuration section added to the General Settings page

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v1.1.6...v1.1.7

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.8
entry.content:
Changes:

  • [FEATURE] Added email notification option in General Settings to alert app owners when new users register

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v1.1.7...v1.1.8

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.9
entry.content:
Changes:

  • [FEATURE] Max workspace team members configuration setting introduced

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v1.1.8...v1.1.9

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.10
entry.content:
Changes:

  • [FEATURE] Box links can be nested in other websites as widgets

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v1.1.9...v1.1.10

entry.title: New release for PlikShare: v1.1.11
entry.content:
Changes:

  • [IMPROVEMENT] BoxLink auth cookie replaced with BoxLink token header

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damian-krychowski/plikshare/compare/v1.1.10...v1.1.11
